basics.name: Chaitanya Mehta
basics.label: Graduate Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a M.S. in Computer Engineering at North Carolina State University. I will graduate in Spring, 2021.

work.summary: Added new features to a Lighting System Design application that allows users to visually place equipment on floor plan, configure, connect them, and then generate comprehensive reports like bill of material, connection diagrams, etc.
highlights: Participate and contribute in design development.
Fix bugs, debug and resolve memory and performance issues.
Create proof of concepts for new and high-risk features.
Developed new ReportFlowDocument based product report.
Added support for generating QR codes from web links.
Used ASP.NET web API to create RESTful web service.
Worked with AutoCAD 2017 to add new device blocks to dxf files.
Performed peer level code and functional reviews.
Worked on bug-fixes and support issues.
Developed code along with their test cases and documentation in an agile environment.
Added new WPF GUI screens and elements to support new workflows.
Added new devices and their properties in the app database.
Refactored direct calls to 3rd party zip library into an interface driven adapter class, to make library replacement easier.
Developed an internal application using Jira API to generate worklog report for current sprint.
